t: Psalm 135
Your Name, O Lord, Endures Forever
Praise*pn the Lord!*s Praise*ln the name of the Lord,*s give*ld praise, O servants of the Lord,*s
who*ln stand in the house of the Lord,*s in*ld the courts of the house of our God!
Praise*ln the Lord,*s for the Lord*s is good; sing*ld to his name, for it is pleasant!
For*ln the Lord*s has chosen Jacob for himself, Israel*ld as his own possession.
For*pn I know that the Lord*s is great, and*ld that our Lord is above all gods.
Whatever*ln the Lord*s pleases, he does, in*ld heaven and on earth, in*ld the seas and all deeps.
He*ln it is who makes the clouds rise at the end of the earth, who*ld makes lightnings for the rain and*ld brings forth the wind from his storehouses.
He*pn it was who struck down the firstborn of Egypt, both*ld of man and of beast;
who*ln in your midst, O Egypt, sent*ld signs and wonders against*ld Pharaoh and all his servants;
who*ln struck down many nations and*ld killed mighty kings,
Sihon,*ln king of the Amorites, and*ld Og, king of Bashan, and*ld all the kingdoms of Canaan,
and*ln gave their land as a heritage, a*ld heritage to his people Israel.
Your*pn name, O Lord,*s endures forever, your*ld renown, O Lord,*s throughout all ages.
For*ln the Lord*s will vindicate his people and*ld have compassion on his servants.
The*pn idols of the nations are silver and gold, the*ld work of human hands.
They*ln have mouths, but do not speak; they*ld have eyes, but do not see;
they*ln have ears, but do not hear, nor*ld is there any breath in their mouths.
Those*ln who make them become like them, so*ld do all who trust in them.
O*pn house of Israel, bless the Lord!*s O*ld house of Aaron, bless the Lord!*s
O*ln house of Levi, bless the Lord!*s You*ld who fear the Lord,*s bless the Lord!*s
Blessed*ln be the Lord*s from Zion, he*ld who dwells in Jerusalem! Praise*ln the Lord!*s
